items.sentence: Are you sure you don\'t want me to help you out?
Take this medicine and you\'ll feel better soon.
Tom killed his brother with their father\'s gun.
Tom knew Mary\'s husband before she got married.
Tom knew he didn\'t have enough time to do that.
Tom knew why Mary didn\'t want him at her party.
Maybe Tom was trying to warn us about something.
My brother fell out of a tree and broke his leg.
There isn\'t enough space here for forty people.
If anybody could convince Tom, it would be Mary.
